product_name: Partners West Exploring the Appalachian Trail: Hikes in Southern New England - 2nd Edition
long_description: Whether staying close to home or planning a trip, Exploring the AT: Hikes in Southern New England offers helpful advice for enjoying the Appalachian Trail through 3 separate states.
short_description: Whether staying close to home or planning a trip, Exploring the AT: Hikes in Southern New England offers helpful advice for enjoying the Appalachian Trail through 3 separate states.
